TopicTitle: Way to change the order files in GameData are loaded?

Articles.Content: A wild question, im testing with mods and KSP tends to close itself and I don't have the patience to wait 10 minutes until the folder that I want loads and makes KSP close.

They are loaded alphabetically, if you rename the folder to something earlier in the alphabet it will load sooner.

Warning: May have side effects, especially if the folder includes plugins.

Please do not change folder names That will break mods, and just leads to more posting here. :]

Just make a second "dev" install, and remove any unneeded-for-testing mods from that install.
